1.title: 1. Bölüm
1.plot: Yaman, who lives in the suburb of Istanbul (Tozludere), gets into trouble because of his elder brother. Until that day he tried to change his destiny by working to be a good student. That evening he will unwillingly be introduced to crime. And his clean dossier is tainted. He meets lawyer Selim Serez when he has lost all the hope. Selim sees in Yaman a promising young man, under the mud that is over him. Yaman who gets into trouble even more while trying to stay out of it, reminds him of himself and doesn't want this guy's story to end behind iron bars Yaman doesn't ...

2.title: 2. Bölüm
2.plot: Her mother's arrest, Yaman revealed the missing pieces in his life story. Yaman is not only full of grief, life stance also deserves a chance. As a mother, Ender, shields and Yao gives one last chance to.

18.title: 18. Bölüm
18.plot: The effect of the confrontation between Yaman and Orkun will continue long and an earthquake begins.Orkun has not only lost credibility in front of his family and friends, but he becomes the target of his father's anger and his pride will be demolished. After having started the cleaning by Orkun, Yaman will confront Hasan and is committed to close all the dark doors of his story. That same night, Faruk will have a car accident and this will affect Yaman's life in Tozludere. On the other hand, and after days of separation, Yaman and Mira will have a calm talk. Yaman ...

35.title: 35. Bölüm
35.plot: After Tan's death, Yaman and Mira are trying to forget the difficult days they went through. The traditional picnic that is organized by ASK's foundation for Mother's day will have positive and negative effect in everyone's relationships.The picnic brings all the Altinkoy habitants together and will bring to the day light the secret feuds and rivalries. The fact that the editor of Sude's new magazine, Sinan Enveroglu, come into their lives in a fast pace,will upset Selim from the first moment. Sude and Faruk find a common point that they have to build a more safe and ...

36.title: 36. Bölüm
36.plot: The tension in Yaman and Mira's relationship that was created because of the news about Kenan and Sude's relationship will escalate after Kenan's new decisions. However Mira realizes she has been unfair with Yaman and makes a step back. Both of them won't allow to be tension between them, when the days are counted for Mira's departure. Yaman and Mira are trying to seize every moment. The dinner they had planned for a long time, finally will become true. Mira that night will give her unexpected gift for Yaman's birthday. But that gift won't make Yaman happy. The Serezs...

37.title: 37. Bölüm
37.plot: Yaman and Orkun try to solve the problem between them. Yaman's party ends with Asim hitting Kenan. The party that ends at the Serez house will continue on the beach. Yaman and Mira continue the celebration with their friends.Yaman forgets about the fight that happened when he learns Mira's good news. Yaman is having a great time with Mira even though he isn't forgetting for a moment that in a few days she will leave. The postponing of Mira's departure date encourages Yaman. He decides to try hard in order to be able to go with Mira to America. On the other side, Mira ...

38.title: 38. Bölüm
38.plot: Ender is in a car crash. This leaves her family broken.

imdb.plot outline: Yaman, who lives in the suburb of Istanbul Tozludere, gets into trouble because of his big brother. Until that day he tried to change his destiny by working to be a good student. That evening he will unwillingly be introduced to crime. And his clean dossier is tainted. He meets lawyer Selim Serez when he has lost all the hope. Selim sees in Yaman a promising young man, under the mud that is over him. Yaman who gets into trouble even more while trying to stay out of it, reminds him of himself and doesn't want this guy's story to end behind iron bars Yaman doesn't take seriously the offer of a rich lawyer at first, but after problems that surface after his return to his house, her realizes he won't be able to continue his life where he left it. Loud voices from the poor house once again reach Selim. Yaman doesn't refuse Selim's offer this time and he takes a new step towards the door that lead to a new world offered to him by a man whom he met under bad circumstances. Even if Yaman is aware that there are no miracles in real life, and that he doesn't have another chance apart from going through that door. Carrying the weight of past on his shoulders, among people he doesn't know, he will face a more difficult life than the one he had in Tozludere.
imdb.title: Medcezir
plot: Yaman,who lives in one of the Istanbul's suburbs,is arrested and put in jail along with his brother Kenan for his brother stole a car at a gas station.Yaman gets a chance for a brand new start when he meets a lawyer Selim who takes Yaman to his new home.::scaryofmonsters

That evening he will unwillingly be introduced to crime. And his clean dossier is tainted. He meets lawyer Selim Serez when he has lost all the hope. Selim sees in Yaman a promising young man, under the mud that is over him. Yaman who gets into trouble even more while trying to stay out of it, reminds him of himself and doesn't want this guy's story to end behind iron bars Yaman doesn't take seriously the offer of a rich lawyer at first, but after problems that surface after his return to his house, her realizes he won't be able to continue his life where he left it. Loud voices from the poor house once again reach Selim. Yaman doesn't refuse Selim's offer this time and he takes a new step towards the door that lead to a new world offered to him by a man whom he met under bad circumstances. Even if Yaman is aware that there are no miracles in real life, and that he doesn't have another chance apart from going through that door. Carrying the weight of past on his shoulders, among people he doesn't know, he will face a more difficult life than the one he had in Tozludere.::scaryofmonsters

Yaman,a boy from a poor family, gets arrested by the police but then he meets a lawyer Selim who felt connected to him and helps him get out of his former neighborhoud and gives him the opportunity to prove to everyone that he's not just a lost cause.::ahmetkozan
